title: Our first podcast
description: This is our very first and very awkward podcast. Enjoy familiar dog noises like walking, panting, heavy breathing, and snoring. Enjoy conversations and stories about corruption at bible college. And hear about why we want to make this podcast.

title: Detecting New Thought in Your Church
description: Listen as we discuss sex cults, and the infiltration of new thought into your church.

title: Counterfeit Spirit
description: In this episode we talk about Gifts of the Holy Spirit (1 Corinthians 12:4-11), Fruit of the Spirit (Galatians 5:22-23), and their counterfeits in the church, one main example being the kundalini spirit of Hinduism. Does the fruit of a ministry smell rotten? Can you check more boxes in the deeds of the flesh (Galatians 5:17-21) than the fruit of the Spirit? Repent, and walk with Jesus!

title: Hell
description: Let's talk about hell, and see what the bible says about it. What do mainline protestants believe? What about new age/variations on Christianity? Do we have hope? Find out all that and more in this episode!
